0.title: My Experiment: #VanLifeAttila(Pilot)
0.plot: This is a second pilot that was shot, the first was not received well. This pilot was taken from another series("Vlogs") that also starred Attila which has good viewership, that's why it was extended to this travel show.

1.title: Introduction
1.plot: In the first episode Attila begins to prepare his van for living in full time. He begins to place a bed inside-however this beginning is NOT the planned start date...

2.title: Wet Bed/Personal Stories
2.plot: The host(Attila) discusses more of his struggles with Depression, reasons to why he has left the film industry professionally, and the continuing struggle with his wet bed!

3.title: Guess Work in a White Coat!
3.plot: Attila talks about caring about your own health and not just slipping it under the rug because someone who wears a white coat tells you that 'this will cure you'! And talks about parking in the West End of Vancouver.

4.title: Grouse Grindr
4.plot: Attila tackles the Grouse Grind in North Vancouver in about 30 min; then sits for a terrible selfie stick interview with VO actor Becky Oben.

5.title: Becky Oben: Part 1
5.plot: Attila talks to Becky about being a VO actor, a mother, a wife, and politics...

6.title: Becky Oben: Part 2
6.plot: In part 2 of the season 1 finale, Attila continues his conversation with voice over actor Becky Oben, as they now talk about what values we seeks as artists when it comes to working in childrens' theatre and choosing voice over work.

7.title: Becky Oben: Part 3
7.plot: Becky Oben begins to open up a little about her family, and how being in the media world effects her children, her husband, herself and, in general is affecting the decisions we make in society when it comes to politics and how the media has de-educated a lot of people to where it's a worry who we might be passing the future on to.

8.title: Becky Oben: Part 4
8.plot: #VanLifeAttila says farewell to Vancouver and Becky -and resolves the cat urine problem; as Attila moves on to Barkerville, BC in season 2.

1.title: Hope. A Dangerous Thing.
1.plot: Attila now travels to live in Barkerville/Wells BC.

2.title: Hit 'n' Run
2.plot: The second part to the season 2 premiere - We continue just after Attila's accident.

3.title: God Is a Copout
3.plot: We continued from the car accident, trapped in Sicamous, BC. Waiting to an wondering if Attila has enough money to pay for a hotel and fix the car so one: he doesn't freeze and two: so can leave.

4.title: Welcome to the Caribou
4.plot: As our host enters the Caribou region of Canada, and faces another accident.

5.title: What Is Reality
5.plot: As Attila drives closer to Barkerville, he reflects on his delusions that he had as a child-which helped him survive his parents.

6.title: Pussy vs Problems
6.plot: The road trip gets interrupted with another interview, this time with advice columnist Dayna Furst. We move her from hard copy writing to online media.

7.title: DearestDayna: Working for Free in Banff
7.plot: In the second part of the interjecting segment, Dayna and Attila talk about being asked to work for free.

8.title: Working for Free
8.plot: We are now shown what was talked about in the previous episode; shown what Attila was asked to similarly make for free.

9.title: Flashback
9.plot: In the last stretch of highway before Barkerville, he passes through an area and town where he shot one of his films: "Over". Thoughts of the past flood back.

10.title: DearestDayna: Color Me Purple
10.plot: Dayna struggles to find a username for herself and online persona, and Attila realized what the phrase "color me purple" means and promptly swears.

11.title: @DearestDayna: Signing Up
11.plot: Dayna finally finds herself online; but now faces the task of creating numerous social media platforms such as: YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, and more, and more, and more - Tiringly.

12.title: Painful Arrival: PART 1
12.plot: Finally in Barkerville; Attila takes a moment to visit inside-to get re-acquainted-as he knows it will-and might be a painful re-visit. He breaks down in tears as he leaves to his cabin; before returning tomorrow to face his demons.

13.title: Painful Arrival: PART 2
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Novel Reading: My Memoirs
14.plot: In the season finale, we are teased by #VanLifeAttila with a reading from his novel-about the feature film The...; about his life, before we return next season to watch Attila live in a ghost town and see why he ends up in the hospital.

1.title: The Butler Did It
1.plot: The host spends the summer living in a gold town.

2.title: Dr. Joseph Park
2.plot: Attila begins to change into his character "Dr. Joseph Park"; as he is fitted for his suit.

3.title: Constructively Ill
3.plot: Attila used his handy skills to build shelving around the Cariboo Joy Campground-while sick.

4.title: Food, Rehearsals, Food
4.plot: Back to 2012, the last time that Attila was in Wells, BC. We see where he lives and how his day is spent; rehearsing, acting, eating. This is where the film "Over" was created; which we see parts of slowly come to screen.

5.title: An Ideal Life
5.plot: Attila talks about his emotions about the future and how his depression and media have affected his reactions to situations. Giving advice to people to just try different things in life, in order to find out what fits. Because you might have everything you want, until you try something new and realize that what you had was not as good as what you must tried. 'Cause what you had may not be what you want, but didn't know it until you tried something else.

6.title: A Domestic Life
6.plot: The series jumps to another flashback episode to 2012. This one takes a look at the domestic life at the time of actor Attila. And we see more of "Dr. Joseph Park".

7.title: Cariboo Joy RV Park
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Man Make Fire Aka Cooking with the Hun: Early Days
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: The Picnic Table
9.plot: Attila builds stuff around the campgrounds.

10.title: Attila the Drunk
10.plot: Meanwhile back in 2012. - Attila is drunk.

11.title: St. George Hotel
11.plot: Attila is back as "Mr. Butler" teaching views about the day to day life of a Butler.

12.title: The Day to Day
12.plot: Meanwhile back 2012 - We peek back in on the day-to-day life of Attila and watch as he cooks and does more rehearsal.

13.title: Therapy Tools. Butler Tools.
13.plot: Attila discusses his depression and the tools he uses to help him cope.

14.title: #CookingWithTheHun(bacon turkey)
14.plot: Meanwhile back in 2012 - Attila works on his cookbook.

15.title: 1 Year After Starting Meds for Depression
15.plot: Attila talks about being on medication for depression caused by child abuse, spousal abuse, and PTSD.

16.title: That Moment When You Know
16.plot: Meanwhile back in 2012 - A realization becomes more ingrained in Attila, about where he wants his future to be; which leads to the feature film The...(2017).

17.title: What Will I Be Like at 90?
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: WWJD? Part 1: Free Legal Advice
18.plot: The proud lawyer Joseph Park offers free legal advice; because of course he is the best lawyer in the city.

19.title: Forget the Middle Man
19.plot: Attila discusses more about his feelings of not spending millions on the film industry and donating it instead.

20.title: Back in the 1800s
20.plot: Joseph Park prepares to head to Fort Victoria; but not before giving a sobering speech.

21.title: Stanley
21.plot: Attila takes a tour of the Stanley graveyard.

22.title: WWJD? Part 2: Free Legal Advice
22.plot: Joseph Park provides more free legal advice.

23.title: Diminished Mental Capacity: Part 1
23.plot: Attila opens up and does part 1 of a handy-held interview with himself; talking about his mental illness and difficulties.

24.title: Ghosts of Minnehaha
24.plot: Joseph Park has a discussion about his exploits with ghosts.

25.title: Diminished Mental Capacity: Part 2
25.plot: The second part of Diminished Mental Capacity, Attila finishes his thoughts on depression and anxiety.

26.title: Shots for the Queen(Victoria)
26.plot: Attila get's a little drunk as Joseph Park.

27.title: Take 2 and Call Me in the Morning
27.plot: Attila visits the doctors to request medical tests for his lack of memory.

28.title: Welcome to the 1930's
28.plot: Attila time travels to the 1930's gold rush and becomes a miner.

29.title: The Butler Didn't Do It
29.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

30.title: Gramophone
30.plot: Mr. Brown teaches the people about music.

31.title: a Film by Attila
31.plot: Attila talks about his last film "Over" (2012) which to him is the best an worst film he has done to date.

32.title: The Full Tour
32.plot: Joseph Park Tequila Mockingbird take you on a tour of historic gold rush town Barkerville.

33.title: There's No Place Like Home
33.plot: After a money losing summer Attila heads to Vancouver; and begins to shoot Season 4.

34.title: Joseph Park: A Term of Slang
34.plot: Joseph Park explains the history of the English language.

35.title: Clinical Depression: Season Finale
35.plot: As Attila returns to Vancouver, with no money, he begins living full time in his Van. This was the fist episode of VanLifeAttila; this was the start. The decision to live in a van; or lack there of decision. 1 year to go.

1.title: #VanLife
1.plot: Attila tries to do a different job every week.

2.title: All Work and No Play
2.plot: The first job Attila tries is being cabin crew on a dinner cruise.

3.title: Horrible People
3.plot: Attila witnesses a Hit n' Run.

4.title: Parking Problems vs Real Problems
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: My Feature Film
5.plot: Attila talks about his last fictional feature film Cold Side of the Pillow and how it has brought him here, and where the status of it is.

6.title: Car Accessories
6.plot: Attila purchases stuff for his car and does a DIY.

7.title: A Waste of Money
7.plot: Attila talks about his disappointment with how much money is wasted on the film industry; and how many lies producers tell people.

8.title: Bullseye
8.plot: A DIY episode on how to get rid of bullseyes on your windshield, and more.

9.title: You Brought 'Er You Lick 'Er
9.plot: After going to his doctor to get injections; Attila continues his experiment to do as many jobs as possible.

10.title: First Audition in 5 Years
10.plot: More DIY, more Jobs of the Week; and Attila talks about possibly returning to the stage.

11.title: Ranting: The Frustrated Me
11.plot: Attila opens up about his thoughts in general; and shows his annoyed human side.

12.title: Job 5
12.plot: Attila takes on his 5th job, sprayfoam cleaner.

13.title: Getting Ready for Winter
13.plot: Animals are saved, and preparations are being made for winter van dwelling.

14.title: Job 6
14.plot: The next job i the experiment is working as Theatre Crew.

15.title: @DearestDayna
15.plot: Fashion Designer and Advice Columnist Dayna Furst takes over to discuss bullying and violence; while we watch Attila take on a new job.

16.title: Driving Tips/Palettes
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: More Jobs
17.plot: Attila takes on managing an Italian restaurant.

18.title: Questions
18.plot: Attila answers questions from the public that were posted on social media.

20.title: Car Problems
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: I Give Up
22.plot: The first winter to hit Vancouver in almost ten years, happens to be the one when Attila starts this experiment. It becomes too cold to handle.

24.title: Child Abuse
24.plot: Attila talks briefly about his child abuse, and more about what will come in his feature documentary; and prepares for the season final.

25.title: Winter in Vancouver?!
25.plot: Attila continues to keep warm in the winter.

26.title: Settling Into My Life-Sorta.
26.plot: Attila begins to find his footing in Vancouver, understanding more about himself beyond being an actor; and starts to find a new career. And even finally takes time to relax with co-workers.

27.title: New Career
27.plot: Attila goes on a road trip with musician Tramp, and co-workers Nancy and Karo to go to an interview for a contract job. But first, the car needs a new VERY heavy battery.

28.title: Live Finale
28.plot: On the last episode of this season, Attila says farewell to the series and announces the new host(s) for the coming season. He recaps on his thoughts on what has happened since he became homeless.

-1.title: Georgia Straight
-1.plot: The Georgia Straight newspaper interviews Attila.

imdb.title: #VanLife
plot: For 1 year, a retired artist is asked live in a car, traveling Canada to see if money, possessions, shelter, heat; are everything. Talking about depression, arts, homelessness, with more-and provides thoughts on life along the way.::Just Act Films
